name: Galazon
description:
Play as a warehouse worker of Galazon, an intergalactic shipping business. As your shift starts and the conveyor belt start running, quickly place the items on the conveyor belt with the best shaped box that corresponds to its own shape. Miss out five items and you will be terminated!
